Method.name: ConvertToProxyObject
GetAll
Method.Implementation:
set proxy = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set proxy.children = ##class(%ListOfObjects).%New()
&sql(DECLARE Curr1 CURSOR FOR SELECT ID, Name, Code FROM Dance_Data.DancerClass)
&sql(OPEN Curr1) for { &sql(FETCH Curr1 INTO :id, :name, :code) quit:(SQLCODE '= 0)
set dc = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set dc.id = id set dc.name = name set dc.code = code
do proxy.children.Insert(dc) }
&sql(CLOSE Curr1)
q proxy
